com.mobius.vdrapi
Class ComparisonOperators

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.mobius.types.EnumBase
        |
        +--com.mobius.vdrapi.ComparisonOperators
public class ComparisonOperators
extends com.mobius.types.EnumBase

All the operators used by Enhanced Search queries are grouped here.

Each Enhanced QueryParam will define its own subset of comparison operators. The query param will then verify that those operators valid for that query.

Field Detail

BT

public static final ComparisonOperators BT
The Between (BT) operator is not currently server-supported. It is converted internally to the following operators:

('A' Between 'B' AND 'C') is converted to ('A' >= 'B' AND 'A' <= 'C')

CT

public static final ComparisonOperators CT
The Contains operator. For Filter queries.

EQ

public static final ComparisonOperators EQ
The Equal to (==) operator

The Greater than or equal to (>=) operator

The Greater than (>) operator

The Less than or equal to (<=) operator

LK

public static final ComparisonOperators LK
The Like operator

LT

public static final ComparisonOperators LT
The Less than (<) operator

NB

public static final ComparisonOperators NB
The Not Between (NB) operator is not currently server-supported. It is converted internally to the following operators:

('A' Not Between 'B' AND 'C') is converted to ('A' < 'B' OR 'A' > 'C')

NE

public static final ComparisonOperators NE
The Not equal to (!=) operator
